doc.title: Children in Need

credit.role: Performer (in the Children in Need musical)

doc.plot: The annual BBC telethon, for its own charity for children. Every BBC local and national radio and TV station gets involved. Your only chance to see Auntie Beeb's top newsreaders and political pundits in _The Rocky Horror Picture Show (1975)_ revival, including 'Jeremy Vine' (qv) in "The Narrator's" stockings and suspenders.
